extendedInfo.description: For a farm so small it fits in your hands, Tiny Farm is jam-packed with sweet surprises and endless possibilities!â Recommended as most interesting Virtual game by AppEggs! ââ Recommended as top 10 hottest app by AppBrain! â* Tiny Farm is packed with the rarest animals(115MB+). WiFi connection is strongly recommended!Exciting events with limited offers and seasonal updates are waiting to be discovered!Rare animals caught only by rangers, and other offers for 2013 will continue on in Tiny Farm!Now available for worldwide farmers and animal caretakers, give TLC to your very own barnyard animals and build the best farm.Watch over them so they can grow to breed their own family. Get rare species that will allow you to create your own original homestead!You can play Tiny Farm in íêµ­ì´, English, Deutsch, franÃ§ais, æ¥æ¬èª, ä¸­æç®ä½, ä¸­æç¹é«.----------------------------------------------------------------- CRITICS SAY:TouchArcade: "This is a fun game to play, and it's absolutely adorable...Call me crazy, but I have a sneaking suspicion it might end up being popularâ¦" Pocketnext: "It just doesnât feel fair to ignore Tiny Farm, which is the best farming game on iOS to date." ----------------------------------------------------------------- FEATURESColorful and adorable animals!- From White Sheep, Brown Chicken to Pink and Blue Dairy Cow, you'll find all animals in your favorite colors.- Watch your animals grow as they get bigger with your love.Love is in the air!- Make your critters happy to breed the best animals.- Give Love and breed them to get that special animal.So much more to do than just taking care of animals!- Go on a mission to find legendary animals by hiring a Ranger.- Visit your friends farm to help out and share the love.- Grow Alfalfas, Beans, and Potatoes for extra income.- Darling designs and decorative structures mean your farm is unique and gorgeous.ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Defense Technica: Think you know Tower Defense? reviews.title: Fun but refund request ignored
reviews.comment: I\'ve been having trouble buying bells lately. When I asked for one purchase to be fulfilled because they took money but gave no bells, I was responded to the next day.  Yet when I ask for a refund of another purchase where I didn\'t get bells (again), I get ignored. It\'s been five days. Very disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Takes money then won\'t respond
reviews.comment: Bought bells. They got money I got nothing. Won\'t return my calls or emails
reviews.author: Deanne Gilliam

reviews.title: Much much better
reviews.comment: Thank you so Much for working out the bugs. I love this game. Your game let\'s me get away from reality. I love it so much. The graphics are the cutest I have ever seen. Keep it up com2us. All your games are the bomb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I don\'t care, I love it!
reviews.comment: I crash my car into a brigade and I don\'t care I love it! (This game)
reviews.author: Liloa Sambueno

reviews.title: Fun at a price
reviews.comment: The game is very cute and engaging, but to buy any good animals, or decorations, you are going to need to pay actual money. Not much of a free game that way.
reviews.author: Rajiv Parkhi

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Just started playing and this game has bugs :/ it\'s having a lot of error and wasted my resources
reviews.author: lim su xian

reviews.title: Wow!!
reviews.comment: So adorable, I love it!! Best farming/animal game. So cute!! And its easy to feed, breed, and take care of your animals. Thank you for such a cute game!!
reviews.author: Kenneth Jones

reviews.title: What happened to my farm ?
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun, very addicting adorable game. I love the coot lil animals & how i don\'t have 2 check on my farm 24/7. After the recent update I am unable 2 enter the game without having a wi-fi connection. I have uninstalled the game & reinstalled, but it made no difference. Now i cannot play tiny farm till i get 2 school, which is 2 days in a week btw. . . Please fix this issue.
reviews.author: Kyazain Hernandezu

reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
reviews.comment: **It gets pretty slow after 5 minutes of gameplay and I usually have to restart it.**I have had this game for almost a year and I still love it! It is so incredibly cute and very addicting. I\'d probably cry if anything bad happened to my farm. *I love all the new themed animal challenges!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Help!!!
reviews.comment: Sigh.... keeps saying update incomplete. Nothing wrong with my wifi... sigh.... I wanna hurry feed my animals and play. What\'s wrong?!?!? Why can\'t I enter my game?!?! This always happen when there\'s an update! !! Makes me dread updates!  It\'s so cuuuute.... the waiting time\'s fine as well....   Adding of friends is easy. Awesome game to kill time with too.
reviews.author: Stephanie Yeo

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Plus let us earn 1 bell every 5 minutes max 30 bells at a time. Thanks
reviews.author: Timothy Sanford

reviews.title: Love this game!
reviews.comment: Love this game! There are so many quests and animals, more than most other games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So cute!
reviews.comment: I love this game! It isn\'t too difficult or boringly easy!
reviews.author: Lauren Bomer

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Very cute game, the best virtual one I\'ve come across so far. My only problem, which brings the rating down by a star, is that when you enable notifications, it will send push notifications, which can wake up your device. I do want notifications, but small ones in the notifications bar, not ones that waste my battery at night. Also, would love my own anniversary fountain instead of cake.... *puppy eyes* Other than that, wonderful game!!!
reviews.author: Yuliya Levytska

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: I love It, but be warned... It\'s addicting.
reviews.author: Janice Marie

reviews.title: Adorable and Addictive
reviews.comment: This is a fun and easy to understand app. However, there are some problems that need to be fixed. The screen goes black at times even though the app is still running as though it were perfectly fine. You can hear sounds from the game if you tap the areas where things should be.
reviews.author: Hannah Fu

reviews.title: Excellent!! Cherry mobile burst
reviews.comment: But after this last update. My chad fish rewards was gone.  Ill give my 5 stars again after this got fix  More power
reviews.author: robi gomez

reviews.title: New upgrade
reviews.comment: Why does the new update just keep coming up with \'invalid package file\'?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: You can earn bells for free either in-game or via promotions, this is a huge plus for me. As far as I can tell, \'premium\' animals can be gained without purchasing bells too if you don\'t want to spend real cash, in my experience so don\'t be offput.   Love this game mainly for the fact it allows for a lot of creativity in placing fences, rivers and decorations.
reviews.author: Si\303\242n Hughes

reviews.title: Good so far
reviews.comment: Working now thank you
reviews.author: Emily Wong
